github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: write the commit message in English. Start the first line with a tag between square brackets e.g [fix|hotfix|feat|refactor|docs|test|task]. Max 50 characters in first line including the tag. Max 72 characters each of the lines in the following lines. First line should be a summary of the changes made. Next lines should be a detailed description of the changes made with a bullet list of files changed.
